verses.verse: The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was upon <S%H3318>me<s%>, and carried me out in the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and set me <S%H5117>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley<s%> which was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H6106>bones<s%>,

And caused me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> by them round <S%H5439>about<s%>: <S%H3966>and<s%>, behold, there were very <S%H7227>many<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H1237>valley<s%>; <S%H3966>and<s%>, behold, they were very <S%H3002>dry<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, can these <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>? And I <S%H559>answered<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, you <S%H3045>know<s%>.

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5012>me<s%>, Prophesy upon these <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3002>them<s%>, O you dry <S%H6106>bones<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> unto these <S%H6106>bones<s%>; <S%H7307>Behold<s%>, I will cause breath to <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H2421>you<s%>, and you shall live:

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H1517>sinews<s%> upon <S%H5927>you<s%>, and will bring up <S%H1320>flesh<s%> upon <S%H7159>you<s%>, and cover you with <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in <S%H2421>you<s%>, and you shall live; and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: and as I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>, there was a <S%H6963>noise<s%>, and behold a <S%H7494>shaking<s%>, and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> came <S%H7126>together<s%>, <S%H6106>bone<s%> to his <S%H6106>bone<s%>.

And when I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, <S%H1517>behold<s%>, the sinews and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> upon <S%H5785>them<s%>, and the skin <S%H7159>covered<s%> them <S%H4605>above<s%>: but there was no breath in <S%H7307>them<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H5012>me<s%>, Prophesy unto the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H935>Come<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%>, O <S%H7307>breath<s%>, and <S%H5301>breathe<s%> upon these <S%H2026>slain<s%>, that they may <S%H2421>live<s%>.

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H7307>me<s%>, and the breath <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H2421>them<s%>, and they lived, and stood <S%H5975>up<s%> upon their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, a <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>.

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>me<s%>, Son of <S%H120>man<s%>, these <S%H6106>bones<s%> are the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: <S%H559>behold<s%>, they say, Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H3001>dried<s%>, and our <S%H8615>hope<s%> is <S%H6>lost<s%>: we are cut off for our <S%H1504>parts<s%>.

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H5971>Behold<s%>, O my people, I will <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H6913>graves<s%>, and cause you to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of your <S%H6913>graves<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, when I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> your <S%H6913>graves<s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of your <S%H6913>graves<s%>,

And shall <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in <S%H2421>you<s%>, and you shall live, and I shall <S%H3240>place<s%> you in your own <S%H127>land<s%>: then shall you <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H6213>it<s%>, and performed <S%H5002>it<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came again unto <S%H559>me<s%>, saying,

<S%H1121>Moreover<s%>, you son of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>, and <S%H3789>write<s%> upon <S%H3063>it<s%>, For Judah, and for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions<s%>: then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>, and <S%H3789>write<s%> upon <S%H3130>it<s%>, For Joseph, the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and for all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions<s%>:
And <S%H7126>join<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>; and they shall become <S%H259>one<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And when the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of your <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>speak<s%> unto <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, Will you not show us what you mean by <S%H5046>these<s%>?

<S%H1696>Say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H3947>Behold<s%>, I will take the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, which is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>fellows<s%>, and will <S%H5414>put<s%> them with <S%H6086>him<s%>, even with the stick of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>, and they shall be <S%H259>one<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
And the <S%H6086>sticks<s%> whereon you <S%H3789>write<s%> shall be in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H1696>say<s%> unto <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>; <S%H3947>Behold<s%>, I will take the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, where they be <S%H1980>gone<s%>, and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them into their own <S%H127>land<s%>:

And I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> to them <S%H5750>all<s%>: and they shall be no more <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, neither shall they be <S%H2673>divided<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> kingdoms any more at <S%H4467>all<s%>:

Neither shall they <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves any more with their <S%H1544>idols<s%>, nor with their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%>, nor with any of their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: but I will <S%H3467>save<s%> them out of all their <S%H4186>dwellingplaces<s%>, where they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> <S%H5971>them<s%>: so shall they be my people, and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H259>them<s%>; and they all shall have one <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>: they shall also <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H8104>observe<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and do <S%H6213>them<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, where your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3427>lived<s%>; and they shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H1121>it<s%>, even they, and their sons, and their <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be their <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> with <S%H5769>them<s%>; it shall be a everlasting <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5414>them<s%>: and I will place <S%H7235>them<s%>, and multiply <S%H5414>them<s%>, and will set my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
My <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> also shall be with <S%H430>them<s%>: Yes, I will be their God, and they shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
